EmailTemplate.name: Partner Portal Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to BlueWave's Partner Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to BlueWave — our energy future starts with you!
Thanks for choosing BlueWave as your community solar provider and supporting local solar energy. Your community solar subscription has been approved!
Now that you're a BlueWaver, you can log into your community solar portal to:
• Chat with a member of the BlueWave Customer Care team • Submit and manage support cases • View your statements and make payments • Access support articles
To access your portal, click the link below and login using the username, {!Receiving_User.Username}. If this is your first time logging into the portal, please click the link below to create a new password.
Log Into Your Portal Here
Have questions? Check out our FAQs or log into your portal to chat with a member of our Customer Care team. You can also reach us at 844.786.4100 or customercare@bluewavesolar.com. We're happy to help. Thanks for joining the Wave, we're happy you're here. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
